QuestData.Title: One of the People
QuestData.Description:
It is time for you to enter the city proper, $n.
I am sending you to my loyal friend Vanthir. I do hope you remember him- I can guarantee that he remembers you.
I will not be able to accompany you, but I must stress that the disguise I have granted you is not impervious. Tread carefully, and avoid those who stare too long.
Farewell for now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Vanthir in Suramar City.
QuestData.RewardText: Glad you could make it. Your help is sorely needed here.
